title: Self-Directed Game-Based Learning Design Scenarios for Bioaccumulation and Biomagnification

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational understanding of ecosystems and familiarity with environmental science terminology
context.additional_context: Science education program for in-service professionals to strengthen job competencies in an offline environment with digital device accessibility

learning_goals: Learners accurately explain the mechanisms of biomagnification and bioaccumulation through board game simulations
Learners apply analogical instruction to transfer complex ecosystem phenomena to real-world work cases (e.g., chemical management)
Learners assess risk levels of environmental pollutants based on in-game data analysis
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
